title: Angel Guide
shortDescription: An angel points you to a hidden Scripture fragment and encourages you to share it.
learningGoal: recognize God's care and the role of ministering beings in Scripture
childCopy: An angel appears to guide you — follow the hint to find a Scripture fragment.
matureNote: Angels are ministering spirits who serve God's purposes (Hebrews 1:14). Content frames angelic help as God's care, not magic.
acceptanceCriteria: Player locates the Scripture fragment and can state the short application.

title: Angel's Revival
shortDescription: An angelic ministering action revives a fallen friend — teach how community and prayer sustain us.
learningGoal: understand God’s care and the role of community prayer
childCopy: Send revive tokens and watch as an angel helps bring hope back to a friend.
matureNote: Angel revives are framed as God’s caring action and community prayer, not ritualistic invocation.
acceptanceCriteria: Angel revive triggers only with correct social/consent conditions and is audited.
